title: When to start sending out mails for summer internships?
content: Second year, here , wanna do a good internship in the summer. My first year gpa isn't very good, but it would have stabilised by starting of next sem. When do I start sending out mails, from now on or wait for my gpa to stabilize and send beginning of next sem ?

comments.body:
Screw your gpa,
Just send now.

Hm, if your first year GPA is very good and if you feel you have necessary skills for the particular internship you are applying for . Start sending mails from your 4th semester beginning or the **gap b/w 3rd and 4th semester (if its there lmao)**

But you must have immense patience, as it will take a very long time for them to reply.
How do you typically apply for summer internships

I'd recommend you start around December or January. Don't expect too much cuz getting a internship before finishing 3rd year is quite rare. 


Don't worry too much about gpa unless it's really bad (below 6.75 and such). Make sure you have the skillset and knowledge (and some projects if you can) for the internship you want.
